channel.title: Business Implementations and Transformation on bdna
channel.description: Recent content in Business Implementations and Transformation on bdna

item.title: PHN NT Digital Transformation
item.description: PHN NT engaged Bdna due to our experience in partnering to deliver upgrades to the indigenous education to employment scheme and our extensive experience in digital transformation.

item.title: Project Atlas
item.description: Bdna’s ability to deliver large and complex business and system transitions led to Tasmania Police engaging us to implement the NicheRMS™ solution.

item.title: Change Futures
item.description: Bdna conducted a review of the Change Futures ICT environment providing a list of recommendations to efficiently prepare Change Futures for their expansion.

item.title: Children's Health QLD goes digital
item.description: With the help of bdna, Children’s Health Qld Hospital and Health Service (CHQHHS) successfully transitioned to Qld Health’s integrated electronic Medical Record (ieMR).

item.title: Patient Online Portal
item.description: Bdna have a long and successful history with Queensland Health who have commenced their Patient online Portal (PoP) program that connects hospitals with their patients via an app.

item.title: Queensland Health: Patient Administration System
item.description: Queensland Health have commenced the challenging tasks of replacing an ageing Patient Administration System solution and Bdna are part of the delivery team.

item.title: Clinical Services & Health Improvement Unit Digital Services
item.description: Bdna successfully developed the foundations for reporting and analytics for the Queensland Health Improvement Unit and the Clinical Excellence division.

item.title: Electronic Referrals
item.description: QH engaged Bdna consulting to design, manage and ultimately implement the electronic referral solution.

item.title: Cairns & Hinterland goes digital
item.description: Cairns & Hinterland Hospital and Hospital Service (CHHHS) selected Bdna to help design, deliver and implement the integrated electronic Medical Record (ieMR).

item.title: Integrated electronic Medical Records (ieMR)
item.description: Bdna were engaged by Queensland Health who have commenced the digital health journey with an ultimate goal of improving clinical care.

item.title: Western Health Electronic Medical Record
item.description: Faced with designing, integrating and implementing an Electronic Medical Record (EMR) Western Health engaged Bdna as the prime consulting partner.

item.title: G20 Security Operation
item.description: The Queensland Police Service (QPS) engaged bdna to assist with delivering local security for Australia’s largest peacetime security operation.
